full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,TSE DPAG MED SKU GSUM 'DUS PA'I DKYIL 'KHOR GYI CHO GA 'CHI BA MED PA'I LJON PA KUNTU DGA' BA'I SKYED MOS TSAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @042A *, ,(ZHES BRJOD BYA DANG, ,RDZOD BYED GNYIS KAR RTEN 'BREL GYI PHUN TSOGS MANG POS 'KHYUD PA'ANG ZUR GYIS BSTAN PA'I KHRIGS RIM 'DI NI, RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE SPYI DANG BYE BRAG GI NYER 'TSOR BLA NA MTSUNGS PA MED PA, ,LHA BTZAN PO KHRI SRONG LDE'U BTZAN GYI GDUNG RABS SHING S'A LA BA CHEN PO'I MYU GU, ,GSANG CHEN RDO RJE SNYING PO RGYUD SDE CHEN PO'I RIG PA MCHOG GI DKYIL 'KHOR DU ME TOG PHOG PA'I RIGS KYI COD PAN, ,LHA 'JIGS MED DPA' PO 'CHI MED BSTAN PA'I RDO RJE PHYOGS LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I SDE ZHES YONGS SU DPYANGS PA RJE 'BANGS RNAMS KYI TSOM BU TSOGS KYI SGRUB PA'I RNAL 'BYOR DU BKAS BSKUL BA BZHIN, ,SANGS RGYAS GNYIS PA SLOB DPON CHEN POS BZUNG BA'I RIG PA 'DZIN PA 'JIGS MED GLING PA'AM, GZHAN DU RDZOGS CHEN PA RANG BYUNG RDO RJE MKHYEN BRTZE'I 'OD ZER GYIS BYANG CHUB LJON PA'I NAGS KHROD PADMA 'OD GLING DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
